Great -- we can track the issue, collect comments or votes from others 
who are interested, and whenever the code is battle-tested and in good 
shape it can be reviewed for integration. Thanks,

- Gordon @ IA

Christian Krumm wrote:
> Hi Gordon,
> 
> thanks for your advises. I've created an issue in JIRA (HER-1543).
> I'll attach the code in september or oktober.
> Currently I've haven't much time left to put the code in JIRA. The code
> is even a bit undocumented and I'm currently testing it for large crawls.
> 
> Christian
> 
>> Regarding the Jericho 2.3 versus 2.6 memory issues: there is a previous 
>> issue requesting an upgrade to the 2.4 version:
>>
>> http://webteam.archive.org/jira/browse/HER-1146
>>
>> Based on your report of improvements with 2.6, I will be upgrading the 
>> heritrix (1.x) and heritrix2 trunks to use that version, unless I hear 
>> objections from others using the JerichoHTMLExtractor.
>>
> 
> OK. I can confirm the "invalid header field" error. I've work around the
> problem by downloading the jar from sf and manually adding it to the
> local repository. Using the -o parameter I've forced maven to build
> heritrix offline.
> 
> ------------------------------------
>
